New Records: Denmark extended their undefeated streak on home soil to 13 games
Key Match Events: Albert Gronbaek scored the first goal for Denmark with a brilliant finish past Predrag Rajkovic
Yussuf Poulsen scored the second goal for Denmark with an exquisite bicycle kick into the far corner
Pre-Game Insights: Denmark turned their form around under caretaker coach Lars Knudsen with a 2-0 win over Switzerland on matchday one of the new UNL campaign
Serbia had a significant task ahead of them after holding reigning champions Spain to a gritty goalless draw on UNL matchday one
Post-Match Reflections: Denmark continued their great Nations League start with a second successive victory
Serbia now have a significant task ahead of them after their fourth defeat in 20 games across all editions of the UNL
Miscellaneous Highlights: Denmark found themselves atop Group A4 with a fourth win in five head-to-heads
They are five points above European champions Spain after just two match days, albeit having played a game more
